lyrics: I got a girl named Sue

I got a girl named Daisy

She knows how to love me
Boy, you don't know what she do to me
I got a girl named Daisy
I got a girl named Daisy
She knows how to love me
Boy, you don't know what she do to me
Oh, true fine mama, she's really on the ball,
